headline: Defense stocks rise on Trump comments, Oklo upgraded to Buy
summary: Yahoo Finance Host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including the stock moves for defense contractors Lockheed Martin (LMT), L3Harris Technologies (LHX), and GE Aerospace (GE) after President Trump's address at the World Economic Forum (WEF), and shares of Oklo (OKLO) receiving an upgrade to Buy from Bank of America analysts. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Defense Spending Is Rising—Here Are 3 Stocks Built for Turbulent Times
summary: With geopolitcal tensions rising and world governments increasing defense spending, aerospace stocks are poised to benefit. We like these 3 large caps best.

headline: UBS, RBC Capital Hike Price Targets on L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX)
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is among the 10 Best Defense Stocks to Buy in the S&P 500. On January 15, UBS lifted its price target on the stock to $349 from $323, while keeping a Neutral rating. The adjustment follows RBC Capital’s update a day earlier when the firm hiked its price target to $360 […]

headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights L3Harris, Huntington Ingalls Industries and Intuitive Machines
summary: L3Harris, Huntington Ingalls and Intuitive Machines stand out as aerospace-defense players amid rising defense budgets and persistent supply-chain challenges.
